text: Inge Joanna Francisca Vermeulen (6 January 1985 - 10 January 2015) was a Brazilian-Dutch field hockey player. She played as a goalkeeper for three teams and two international teams: Brazil and the Netherlands. Vermeulen was born in Americana, SÃ£o Paulo and moved to the Netherlands at a young age. Vermeulen committed suicide (killed herself) on 10 January 2015 in Utrecht. She was 30. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch field hockey players Category:Suicides
title: Inge Vermeulen
